long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
ğŸ“¢ Local Markdown file editor in Chrome side panel with live preview. Realtime sync with cloud drives.

ğŸ“Œ Why you should consider this:
âœª live preview markdown
âœª Full featured web clipper
âœª Local Folder explorer
âœª Fuzzy search
âœª Create connections between your notes. Interconnect notes (coming soon)
âœª Realtime sync with local disk, GDrive, Dropbox, oneDrive and Box.
âœª Export notes in three format: markdown,html and pdf (coming soon)
âœª Pure & clean code that powers fastest performance.
âœª No third-party library used.
âœª Negligible memory consumption (consume 400% less memory than new tab).
âœª Lightweight 70kb only
âœª No tracking & no Ads.
âœª Dark mode.

âŒ¨ï¸ keyboard shortcuts
Alt + Mâ‡’ Open paperNote sidePanel
Alt + S â‡’ Capture Screenshot
Ctrl+Z â‡’ undo (work only when copy listener on)
Ctrl+Y â‡’ redo (work only when copy listener on)
Alt + H â‡’ highlight (work only when copy listener on)
Ctrl+ Shift + H â‡’ remove highlight
Shift + Space â‡’ extend selection (work only when copy listener on or atleast one existing highlight)

ğŸ“Œ == FEATURES ==

âœ… Markdown live preview
You don't need to open separate panel to preview your markdown.
paperNote provides a real live preview like wysiwyg editor

âœ… Interconnect your notes
Create connections between your notes. Create your own personal wiki

âœ… Custom Themes & fonts

âœ… Take and insert screenshot
Take screenshot, save to local disk and insert image path into markdown file.

âœ… Save images with correct file path
This extension insert image file into local folder and adds correct image path as markdown link in open markdown file.

âœ… No vendor locked in.
paperNote allow you to open and edit local markdown (.md) file.
Realtime sync with local disk, GDrive, Dropbox, oneDrive and Box.
You can view and edit notes in any other markdown based note editor.

âœ… Realtime sync notes with other cloud providers 
You can sync notes with cloud drive providers:GDrive, oneDrive, Dropbox,box. You can sync notes with cloud notes providers:Notion, onenote (coming soon).

â„¹ï¸ Support 
Join paperNote on google groups: 
https://groups.google.com/g/papernote

You can mail us: noderailhelp@gmail.com

Read more about file security
https://developer.chrome.com/articles/file-system-access/#security-considerations

For Brave browser ğŸ¦
File API is disabled by default.
You need to enable this flag "brave://flags/#file-system-access-api" to work in brave browser.

Opera browser
I don't test this extension in Opera browser

You can change side panel position from settings -> appearance

âœª Sinkronisasi waktu nyata dengan disk lokal, GDrive, Dropbox, oneDrive, dan Box.

âœª Kode murni & bersih yang menghasilkan kinerja tercepat.
âœª Tidak menggunakan pustaka pihak ketiga.
âœª Konsumsi memori yang dapat diabaikan (mengonsumsi memori 400% lebih sedikit daripada tab baru).
âœª Ringan, hanya 70kb
âœª Tanpa pelacakan & tanpa Iklan.
âœª Mode gelap.

âŒ¨ï¸ pintasan keyboard
pintasan keyboard
Alt + Mâ‡’ Buka panel samping paperNote
Alt + S â‡’ Ambil Cuplikan Layar
Ctrl+Z â‡’ batalkan (hanya berfungsi saat pendengar salin aktif)
Ctrl+Y â‡’ ulangi (hanya berfungsi saat pendengar salin aktif)
Alt + H â‡’ sorot (hanya berfungsi saat pendengar salin aktif)
Ctrl+ Shift + H â‡’ hapus sorotan (hanya berfungsi saat pendengar salin aktif)
Shift + Spasi â‡’ perluas pilihan (hanya berfungsi saat pendengar salin aktif)

ğŸ“Œ == FITUR ==

âœ… Pratinjau langsung Markdown
Anda tidak perlu membuka panel terpisah untuk melihat pratinjau markdown Anda.
paperNote menyediakan pratinjau langsung nyata seperti editor wysiwyg

âœ… Hubungkan catatan Anda
Buat koneksi antara catatan Anda. Buat wiki pribadi Anda sendiri

âœ… Tema & font khusus

âœ… Ambil dan sisipkan tangkapan layar
Ambil tangkapan layar, simpan ke disk lokal dan sisipkan jalur gambar ke dalam file markdown.

âœ… Simpan gambar dengan jalur file yang benar
Ekstensi ini menyisipkan file gambar ke dalam folder lokal dan menambahkan jalur gambar yang benar sebagai tautan markdown dalam file markdown yang terbuka.

âœ… Tidak ada vendor yang terkunci.
paperNote memungkinkan Anda untuk membuka dan mengedit file markdown lokal (.md).
Sinkronisasi waktu nyata dengan disk lokal, GDrive, Dropbox, oneDrive, dan Box.
Anda dapat melihat dan mengedit catatan di editor catatan berbasis markdown lainnya.

âœ… Sinkronisasi waktu nyata dengan penyedia cloud lainnya
Anda dapat menyinkronkan catatan dengan penyedia drive cloud: GDrive, oneDrive, Dropbox, box. Anda dapat menyinkronkan catatan dengan penyedia catatan cloud: Notion, onenote (segera hadir).

â„¹ï¸ Dukungan
Bergabunglah dengan paperNote di grup Google:
https://groups.google.com/g/papernote

Anda dapat mengirim email kepada kami: noderailhelp@gmail.com

Baca selengkapnya tentang keamanan file
https://developer.chrome.com/articles/file-system-access/#security-considerations

Untuk peramban Brave ğŸ¦
API File dinonaktifkan secara default.
Anda perlu mengaktifkan tanda ini "brave://flags/#file-system-access-api" agar berfungsi di peramban Brave.

Peramban Opera
Saya tidak menguji ekstensi ini di peramban Opera

Anda dapat mengubah posisi panel samping dari pengaturan -> tampilan

ğŸ“Œ PerchÃ© dovresti prenderlo in considerazione:
âœª Anteprima live markdown
âœª Web clipper completo
âœª Esplora cartelle locali
âœª Ricerca fuzzy
âœª Crea connessioni tra le tue note. Interconnetti note (in arrivo)
âœª Sincronizzazione in tempo reale con disco locale, GDrive, Dropbox, oneDrive e Box.
âœª Esporta note in tre formati: markdown, html e pdf (in arrivo)
âœª Codice puro e pulito che alimenta le prestazioni piÃ¹ veloci.
âœª Nessuna libreria di terze parti utilizzata.
âœª Consumo di memoria trascurabile (consuma il 400% di memoria in meno rispetto alla nuova scheda).
âœª Leggero solo 70 kb
âœª Nessun tracciamento e nessuna pubblicitÃ .
âœª ModalitÃ  scura.

ğŸ“Œ == CARATTERISTICHE ==

âœ… Anteprima live di Markdown
Non Ã¨ necessario aprire un pannello separato per visualizzare in anteprima il markdown.
paperNote fornisce una vera anteprima live come l'editor wysiwyg

âœ… Interconnetti le tue note
Crea connessioni tra le tue note. Crea il tuo wiki personale

âœ… Temi e font personalizzati

âœ… Cattura e inserisci screenshot
Cattura screenshot, salva sul disco locale e inserisci il percorso dell'immagine nel file markdown.

âœ… Salva le immagini con il percorso file corretto
Questa estensione inserisce il file immagine nella cartella locale e aggiunge il percorso immagine corretto come collegamento markdown nel file markdown aperto.

âœ… Nessun fornitore bloccato.
paperNote ti consente di aprire e modificare il file markdown locale (.md).
Sincronizzazione in tempo reale con disco locale, GDrive, Dropbox, oneDrive e Box.
Puoi visualizzare e modificare le note in qualsiasi altro editor di note basato su markdown.

âœ… Esporta facilmente le note
Esporta le note in tre formati:
markdown,html e pdf

ğŸ“¢ Lokale Markdown-bestandseditor in Chrome-zijpaneel met live preview. Realtime synchronisatie met clouddrives.

ğŸ“Œ Waarom u dit zou moeten overwegen:
âœª live preview markdown
âœª Volledig uitgeruste webclipper
âœª Lokale mapverkenner
âœª Fuzzy search
âœª Maak verbindingen tussen uw notities. Verbind notities (binnenkort beschikbaar)
âœª Realtime synchronisatie met lokale schijf, GDrive, Dropbox, OneDrive en Box.
âœª Exporteer notities in drie formaten: markdown, html en pdf (binnenkort beschikbaar)
âœª Zuivere en schone code die de snelste prestaties levert.
âœª Geen externe bibliotheek gebruikt.
âœª Verwaarloosbaar geheugenverbruik (verbruikt 400% minder geheugen dan nieuw tabblad).
âœª Lichtgewicht, slechts 70 kb
âœª Geen tracking en geen advertenties.
âœª Donkere modus.

ğŸ“Œ == FUNCTIES ==

U hoeft geen apart paneel te openen om een â€‹â€‹preview van uw markdown te bekijken.

âœ… Verbind uw notities
Maak verbindingen tussen uw notities. Maak je eigen persoonlijke wiki

âœ… Aangepaste thema's en lettertypen

âœ… Maak en voeg screenshot in
Maak screenshot, sla op op de lokale schijf en voeg het afbeeldingspad toe aan het markdown-bestand.

Deze extensie voegt een afbeeldingsbestand toe aan de lokale map en voegt het juiste afbeeldingspad toe als markdown-link in het open markdown-bestand.

âœ… Geen leveranciersgebonden.
Met paperNote kun je een lokaal markdown-bestand (.md) openen en bewerken.
Realtime synchronisatie met de lokale schijf, GDrive, Dropbox, oneDrive en Box.
Je kunt notities bekijken en bewerken in elke andere op markdown gebaseerde notitie-editor.

âœ… Realtime synchronisatie van notities met andere cloudproviders
Je kunt notities synchroniseren met clouddrive-providers: GDrive, oneDrive, Dropbox, box. Je kunt notities synchroniseren met cloudnote-providers: Notion, onenote (binnenkort beschikbaar).
